nodes.text: "Scherzo for X-Wings" is a concert piece and musical track composed by John Williams for the 2015 sequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, and its score. The piece prominently features variations on the Star Wars Main Title, with a single use of "The Force Theme" towards the end. It is played as Poe Dameron leads his Resistance pilots, operating T-70 X-wing starfighter, to destroy the First Order's Starkiller Base in the film.
